text:
The all-new PALISADE Hybrid

More style meets more miles.

The all-new PALISADE Hybrid was built to turn heads and corners. Equipped with up to 600+ miles of range and a sleek, bold, design, this SUV is sure to get you wherever you’re going with style to spare.

@P HYUNDAI

This content showcases a pre-production model with Korean specifications. Actual model or availability and application of specific features may vary by region and model.
